mapper.sql: attend_id, uid, attend_date, attend_week, attend_moning, attend_evening, absence, attend_status
mapper.select:
SELECT
FROM attend WHERE uid=#{uid} AND attend_date=CURRENT_DATE()
mapper.insert: insert into attend (attend_id, uid, attend_date, attend_week, attend_moning, attend_evening, absence, attend_status) values (#{attendId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{uid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{attendDate,jdbcType=DATE}, #{attendWeek,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{attendMoning,jdbcType=TIME}, #{attendEvening,jdbcType=TIME}, #{absence,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{attendStatus,jdbcType=INTEGER})
